content: get ready to make your new favorite blanket the easy repeats and basic stitches make the parker throw perfect for beginners grab your favorite color of pound of love and get lost in the gorgeous stitches of the parker today pattern is written in us terms materials 2 720 yards of lion brand pound of love in umber 3 skeins us 36 size 10 5 6 5mm circular knitting needles tapestry needle scissors stitch markers finished size is approx 68 x 73 this pattern is also available as a kit from lion brand yarn
